EmailTemplate.subject: Terminix - WEX Fuel Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Introducing our Fuel Card Program courtesy of ServiceMaster's new vendor relationship with WEX. Beginning January 1st, all Terminix contractors will have access to the following:
Save Money • 1.7% rebate on your monthly fuel spend • Credited monthly 30 days in arrears via your fuel statement • 26 day payment terms
Control Fuel
• Know who, what, where and how much your drivers spend • Control spending through online card customization
Convenience • Single card acceptance at most fueling locations • Ability to pay for maintenance on your vehicles
Save Time • Easy to read invoices • Transaction data easily downloaded to QuickBooks or Excel
Please fill out the attached one page credit application entitled ServiceMaster Addendum, and WEX will contact you regarding account set-up. If you already have an existing account with WEX, you can upgrade to this program.
